creator: ajslater@mediaone.net
text:
I fixed it. The proxy is now useful.

Get the files from http://www.cybercom.net/~slater/jmeter/ and drop them into  
src\org\apache\jmeter\protocol\http\proxy and rebuild. Cookies pass through, 
redirects are passed through to the browser and POSTing no longer hangs.

All my work on these files is commented with //!!
What's really needed is some restructuring of how these classes work, but I 
just hacked in these changes to make it work. I'm hoping the developer 
responsible for this uses some of this code to further the product.

Marking all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8's release date as VERIFIED.
Yes, it's pretty poor QA procedure, but there's bugs here lingering since JMeter
1.6, and we need to clean up a little.
creator: jsalvata@atg.com

text: Bulk-closing all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8 release date.
creator: jsalvata@atg.com
